caption.p: Effect of hydrosol on hatching of M. incognita and M. javanica J2s after immersion in test solutions, at the doses of 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.05, 0.1, 0.2 and 0.5 v/ v for 28 days. Bars with the same color followed by the same letter are not significantly different. Error bars represent the standard deviation of mean.
